00018 #ifndef INDRI_SCOPEDLOCK_HPP
00019 #define INDRI_SCOPEDLOCK_HPP
00020 namespace indri
00021 {
00022   namespace thread
00023   {
00024     class ScopedLock {
00025     private:
00026       Lockable* _lockable;
00027 
00028     public:
00029       ScopedLock( Lockable& lockable ) {
00030         _lockable = &lockable;
00031         _lockable->lock();
00032       }
00033 
00034       ScopedLock( Lockable* lockable ) {
00035         _lockable = lockable;
00036 
00037         if( _lockable )
00038           _lockable->lock();
00039       }
00040 
00041       ~ScopedLock() {
00042         if( _lockable )
00043           _lockable->unlock();
00044       }
00045 
00046       void unlock() {
00047         if( _lockable )
00048           _lockable->unlock();
00049         _lockable = 0;
00050       }
00051     };
00052   }
00053 }
00054 
00055 #endif // INDRI_SCOPEDLOCK_HPP
